expire.description: string parsed by time.ParseDuration, examples include: infinite, 8h, 30m, 20s

role.description: type of model.Role, valid options: disabled, user, admin

username.description: username shown in logs, does not need to be a valid user in the DB

file.description: template file relative to templates directory

boot_option.description: string of type redfish.BootSourceOverrideTarget. Common options include: None, Pxe, BiosSetup, Utilities, Diags

power_option.description: string of type redfish.ResetType. Common options include: On, ForceOn, ForceOff, ForceRestart, GracefulRestart, GracefulShutdown, PowerCycle

type.description: URL of the error type. Can be used to lookup the error in a documentation

role.description: type of model.Role, valid options: disabled, user, admin

info.description: OpenAPI spec for the Grendel API
